'''Scroll-Shaped Ward''' is a quest item part of [[Cleansing Defilement]].

==Location==
It is located in the underground part of [[Araumi]] behind a [[Thunder Barrier]]. One needs to use [[Electro]] on the kitsune statue to obtain it.
